markdownRemark.html: Magna Marbella Golf is a 9 Holes course situated on Puerto Banus. It offers an ideal place to enjoy golf at all levels. Magna Marbella Golf, also has a magnificent golf school and a spectacular practice court and short game area, which makes it especially suitable to start in this sport.

frontmatter.title: Magna Marbella Golf

frontmatter.address: C/ Calderón de la Barca, s/n, 29660 Nueva Andalucía, Málaga, Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 17.00 euros, Highest green fee weekends 17.00 euros
